p.s: Description of Massilia haematophila comb nov.

Massilia haematophila (ha.e.ma.to.phi′la. Gr. n. haima -atos (Latin transliteration haema -atos), blood; N.L. adj. philus -a -um (from Gr. adj. philos -ê -on), friend, loving; N.L. fem. adj. haematophila loving blood, referring to the isolation of the type strain from blood).
Basonym: Naxibacter haematophilus Kämpfer et al. 2008.
The description is identical to that given by Kämpfer et al. (2008).
The type strain is CCUG 38318T ( = CCM 7480T).
